title: Make 'Em Say Uhh!, ATL Crime, Beyonce, Trick Daddy and more.
itunes:title: Make 'Em Say Uhh!, ATL Crime, Beyonce, Trick Daddy and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The CLO is candid about what happens when you threaten a grown man. Somebody said Beyonce can't sang. Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms is going head to head with GA Governor Kemp over the crime spike in ATL. Big Dog has a question about the new Federal Holiday. Master P wants to coach The New Orleans Pelicans and make 'em say uhh. There was a billion dollar bank error in Florida. Fool #1 has something to say about vacation relations. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve tells the truth about racism in the United States of America.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
